description:
A planned celebration at a Japanese barbeque restaurant takes an unexpected detour. Akari gets lost, and Kozakura must face her fears. Once again, it`s up to Sorawo and Toriko to save the day.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Elevator de Yakiniku ni Iku Houhou
How to Get to the Barbeque Restaurant by Elevator
Wie man mit einem Fahrstuhl zum Yakiniku fährt
エレベーターで焼肉に行く方法
